text: Settings only in "Manage end user experience" and "Manage Updates offered from Windows Server Update Service". Defender still updates from WU. Drivers are fetched explicitly via PSWindowsUpdate from WU. My guess would be that seting anything in "Manage Updates offered Windows Update" could cause this phenomenon. WSUS settings still a pain in the a... I'm looking forward to find clients connecting to WU as in W10. Never found out why this happens, but it does! Markus Am 16/10/2023 um 16:33 schrieb Susan Bradley: %40univie.ac.at

metadata.topic: Got win11 22H2 and WSUS and not seeing october updates?
